category: Click Boards > Wireless connectivity > 2.4 GHz Transceivers
name: mikroe.click.thyonei
short_description: Thyone-I Click is a compact add-on board for wireless communication in various devices like control systems, remote controls, and sensor nodes. This board features the WIRL-PRO2 Thyone-I (2.1.0.3021000) module from WÃ¼rth Elektronik. It operates in the 2.4GHz license-free band, ensuring secure and reliable data transmission in both point-to-point and mesh configurations. It features versatile connectivity options with onboard and external antenna support, a data transmission rate of up to 2Mbit/s, and embedded security with hardware-accelerated encryption.
